# Creative Tim Components

Creative Tim components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Creative Tim](https://www.creative-tim.com/).

## Components

- Account - [Source](https://www.creative-tim.com/ui/blocks/application-admin/account)
- Charts - [Source](https://www.creative-tim.com/ui/blocks/application-admin/charts)
- KPI - [Source](https://www.creative-tim.com/ui/blocks/application-admin/kpi)
- Logo - [Source](https://www.creative-tim.com/ui/blocks/content-ui/logo)
